channel.title: How to make fisahing spots work?
channel.description:
Heyya,
So how do i make a fishing spot work, i mean...
i guess i put in item2.java the int and shit and i know how to spawn the spot but in npchandler, how do i make it so it uses the int from item2 and gives 21 xp per fish, does the net fishing emote & you need a small net to fish them?
Thanks for whoever helps ;)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
